publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-187# Mr Nick Johnston: Telecommunications—That the Parliament notes the proliferation of telecommunication masts in mid Scotland and Fife and the recent report of the House of Commons Science and Technology Committee into mobile phones and telecommunications.
S1M-187# Telecommunications (lodged on 5 October 1999) Bruce Crawford*

S1M-187# Mr Nick Johnston: Telecommunications—That the Parliament notes the proliferation of telecommunication masts in mid Scotland and Fife and the recent report of the House of Commons Science and Technology Committee into mobile phones and telecommunications. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Dr Richard Simpson*

S1M-187# Mr Nick Johnston: Telecommunications—That the Parliament notes the proliferation of telecommunication masts in mid Scotland and Fife and the recent report of the House of Commons Science and Technology Committee into mobile phones and telecommunications. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Dr Richard Simpson
S1M-187# Telecommunications (lodged on 5 October 1999) Elaine Smith*
